alert.note: Alert for Ben Hill (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 7:20PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Irwin and Ben Hill Counties through 800 PM EST... At 720 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fitzgerald to 6 miles northeast of Unionville. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fitzgerald, Ocilla, Mystic, Lulaville, Osierfield, Fitzgerald Municipal A/P, Wray, Bowens Mill, Pinetta, Red Bluff, Ashton and Queensland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for south central Georgia.
